description: Authentic Italian pizzas and pasta dishes

items.name: Hawaiian
items.description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, and pineapple

items.description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham

items.description: BBQ sauce, mozzarella, grilled chicken, red onions, and cilantro

items.name: Supreme
items.description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives

items.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
items.description: Fettuccine pasta in a creamy Alfredo sauce

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Layers of pasta, ricotta, mozzarella, and meat sauce

items.name: Garlic Bread
items.description: Toasted bread with garlic butter and herbs

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing

items.name: Mozzarella Sticks

items.name: Soft Drinks

items.name: Italian Soda

notes: Gluten-free pizza crust available for an additional $3. Vegan cheese available for an additional $2.
